lyrics.title: Haba haba
lyrics.content: Haba haba hujaza kibaba When as a little girl, my grandma told me That I could be just anything that I wanted to When as a little girl, my grandma told me That I could be just anything that I wanted to She said that Everything I work for, everything I wish for Everything I look for, it is right in front of me Everything I work for, everything I wish for Everything I look for, it is right in front of me And she said ah Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba When as a little girl, my grandma told me That it's the little things in life that's gon' make me happy When as a little girl my grandma told me That it's the little things in life that's gon' make me happy She said that Little by little fills up the measure Don't ever give up, keep on moving Little by little fills up the measure Don't ever give up, keep on moving Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba (Haba haba hujaza kibaba) Sing it (Haba haba hujaza kibaba) (Haba haba hujaza kibaba) (Haba haba hujaza kibaba) Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba Haba haba hujaza kibaba Hujaza kibaba Swahili: "Haba haba hujaza kibaba" means: "Little by little fills the meаѕure"
